fields.name: Archangel's Staff (Crystal Scar)
fields.description: +80 Ability Power +250 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +10 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 6 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
